archimate:Requirement.name: 4.53.3 Email distribution control
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Email client applications should be configured to prevent the accidental disclosure of email and attachments to unauthorised individuals by: preventing users from configuring the auto-forward feature and using auto-complete in email address fields restricting the use of large distribu-tion lists (e.g. a list containing every individual in the organisation) presenting users with a warning before they are able to use the reply all feature to a large number of recipients.
